Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Montrose
ShortDescription: SB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temp. rerouted via: Cicero, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted via: Cicero, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Montrose.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
